title: [BUG] UIWebView still used in Mono and SkiaSharp
body:
**Description**

From december 2020, Apple rejects all app store submissions, that are using the deprecated UIWebView instead of WKWebView. SkiaSharp is one of the libraries, that are still referencing this deprecated API.

From december, it is no longer possible to update an existing app that includes this reference.

**Code**

<!-- a snippet of code that demonstrates the issue -->

**Expected Behavior**

libSkiaSharp must not reference UIWebView

**Actual Behavior**

libSkiaSharp is referencing UIWebView

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.80.2
- Last known good version:  none
- IDE:  Visual Studio Enterprise 2019, Version 16.7.6 | Xamarin.iOS 14.0.0.0
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
